Monster Paradise...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battlecard Episode II Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Monster Paradise...
By Blue Infernos on Thursday, July 19, 2001 - 04:09 pm:

I was wondering, can you do anything in Monster Paradise other than practice battles?

By Eagle Fierce on Monday, July 23, 2001 - 03:32 am:

By repeatedly battling Pixie, you can win the Night Flyer card. By repeatedly battling Mocchi, you can win the Gentle Mocchi card. Other than that, there's nothing important there.
